    • Uses of OfflineSorter.BufferSize in org.apache.lucene.util

      Methods in org.apache.lucene.util that return OfflineSorter.BufferSize 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static OfflineSorter.BufferSize OfflineSorter.BufferSize.automatic()
      Approximately half of the currently available free heap, but no less than OfflineSorter.ABSOLUTE_MIN_SORT_BUFFER_SIZE.
      static OfflineSorter.BufferSize OfflineSorter.BufferSize.megabytes​(long mb)
      Creates a OfflineSorter.BufferSize in MB.
